author: The Film Theorists
description:
Use code filmtheory at https://incogni.com/filmtheory to get an exclusive 60% off!

*🪓 Subscribe for protection against the zombies!* ► https://www.youtube.com/@FilmTheory/?sub_confirmation=1

28 Years Later is TERRIFYING but why? WHY do we find these sorts of zombies so scary? How did 28 Years tap into that fear and create something more horrifying than the zombies that came before it? Well, I may have the answer to that eerie question in today’s video…
